tags: None
review: I had a slight discomfort in my teeth. A long ignored problem. I decided to pay Dr.Arun a visit, he graciously gave an appointment at the earliest possible time. During the treatment i was wary of the pain involved, he reassured me that nothing that will cause me pain will be done. He absolutely lived up to his word. His clinic is well equipped with 3 chairs and ample support staff, all of whom are ready to assist at a moments notice. I have a couple of follow up visits pending but the whole experience was so smooth that i wished to give a testimonial to our dear Doctor so early. Lots of luck to you sir and 10/10 would refer friends and family.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Many thanks to Dr.Sir and staff. Gud and satisfied treatment was carried out without discomfort for patient..we had artificial teeth treatment..though first time..it might have discomfort ..it happens quite natural..hope everything will ride out soon. Senior citizen was the patient......My  Mom  Mrs. Prema Ananthakrishnanan undergo artifical teeth treatment..she feels  little discomfort. Since for the first time she is with artificial teeth..soon she may feels happy..
..many thanks...

tags: None
review: Dr Arun is a godsend. He's a very patient person who genuinely cares about his patients. He always takes the time to explain things to us in terms that we can understand. He’s diligent in ensuring my mother-in-law's health is the best it can be. The entire staff is wonderful. I would recommend Dr Arun to anyone seeking a kind, compassionate, and brilliant doctor! Simply to say, he is ridiculously efficient in diagnosing problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Swetha attended with care and attention. She treated  my 79 year mom with respect and empathy. Though it was a consultation they didn’t immediately recommend for tooth extraction because she advised to get consent letter to stop Clopilet from cardiologist. I am happy about the ambiance though it they have one assistant in the room. Let’s hope that tooth extraction goes well as my first visit.

review: It was good.. so much patience ... Actually I cried while pulling my wisdom teeth due to pain ..but the care Dr.Arun showed after that was awesome... The word CARE is really apt to the CARE DENTAL HOSPITAL...Even the staffs also were so good.... Thank you doctor 🙂.. keep up the good work...
reply_text: Removing a narrowly placed wisdom tooth is always a  difficult task.... Only because of your complete cooperation and trust we have successfully removed your wisdom tooth , it's a permanent relief from wisdom tooth pain. Thank you so much for sharing your experience.... I'm sorry for the discomfort made at that time. Taking care after the extraction is our duty. Happy to see you smiling after that . Best wishes from CARE DENTAL TEAM 😊

tags: None
review:
Too many great reasons why Care Dental is the best dental clinic to list here! Dr. Arun's smile and care is what makes this office the best. EVERYONE in his office are professional and friendly, very personal service. Dr Arun is the most skilled and compassionate dentist, I have ever met. My daughter was extremely anxious prior to our first treatment. Now, she look forward to go to his clinic again for follow up. Dr. Arun make sure to give his patients the best  care and awareness post treatment. The medical book, billing, post treatment procedures and everything was instructed properly.
The office building is comfortable, attractive and clean! An Absolute 5 Star Experience!

tags: None
review:
Dear Dr Arun

You are my 6th Dentist I consulted for my dad's dental problem.  The treatment suggested by most of the dentist are the same but by seeing your clinic cleanliness and the way you explained the treatment was very understandable (as a commen man)  when compared with rest of the dental clinic  is the best to my knowledge.  My dad told that the injection and the multiple root canal treatment and crown was completely painless during and after the procedure. I personally got self satisfaction for the money I spent for my dad.  Thank you Dr for all your patience for hearing my problems first and you explained very clearly about the treatment plan....  Hats off to you ❤ Keep it up , God bless Dr. Arun and staff. 

Thank you once again!!!
reply_text: Thank you. I appreciate your efforts for taking time to give this feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Treatment k but very very cost ly, pls explain first how much cost for treatment, then patient accept  continue ur treatment
reply_text:
Dear Sir , 

      I'm glad that you brought it to my notice. Dental treatment to a kid below 5years is the toughest , not that the procedure is difficult but the child will be very anxious about any dental procedure  when we put on gloves and face masks. It takes a lot of time to do even a single filling.

 Where your kid had more than 6 fillings to be done , i informed the patients attender about one filling cost  and the number of fillings to be done. The attender asked me to do the needful for the rest of the teeth also. 

Not that treatment itself is costlier, the number of procedures done is also matters !!! 

I'm happy that I have rectified your kids dental problem at ease 

Regards
Dr Arun &
Care Dental team
